sentences.en: My straitlaced aunt anna doesn't approve of my miniskirts.
sentences.cn: 我刻板的安娜姑母不喜欢我的迷你裙.

sentences.en: Our unconventional behaviour did in fact shock some of our more straitlaced friends.
sentences.cn: 我们这一不合常规的行为实际上着实让我们的一些一本正经的朋友吓了一大跳。
维多利亚时代守旧的社会

sentences.en: The Don was straitlaced about sex.
sentences.cn: 老头子对男女关系是极端严谨的.
